sulaiman.bio: Sulaiman has led the team to success, specializing in business development and fintech innovation.

mark.bio: Mark is passionate about tech leadership, team building, and client success across the region.

anne.bio: Brings a quarter-century of expertise to the cash industry, with significant contributions in ATM maintenance, Cash in Transit, and Cash Processing. His leadership at Loomis UK managed a substantial budget, overseeing a broad CIT network. As President of ATMs Worldwide for Securitas, he had accountability for a vast array of ATMs across multiple countries. His strategic input has been instrumental in projects for the Central Bank of Kuwait and enhancing profitability for Hong Kong's major note distributor. Dr. Lewis's background in Mathematics and an MBA underpins his strategic and analytical proficiency.

banking.title: Banking & Cash Management
banking.description: Resaad’s Banking & Cash Management service redefines financial efficiency and security. Our expertise spans from specialized cash and currency-related auditing, robust risk frameworks, and innovative security solutions—empowering financial institutions and enterprises with optimized controls and measurable protection.

items.title: Wholesale Cash, CIT & ATM Strategy
items.body: Design operating models and controls for wholesale cash centers, CIT operations, and ATM networks to reduce cost and risk.

items.title: Cash Processing and Supply Chain Audit
items.body: Independent reviews of currency processing, reconciliation, packaging, transport, and custody with quality KPIs.

items.title: Operational and Risk Audits
items.body: End-to-end risk assessments and audit programs across vaults, branches, treasury, and support units.

items.title: Payment System Review and Recommendations
items.body: Evaluate end-to-end payment flows and controls; deliver remediation plans aligned with industry best practice.

items.title: Cash Forecasts & Polymer Note Management
items.body: Optimize cash demand forecasting and lifecycle controls, including polymer note handling & fitness.

items.title: Risk Management & Cyber Security in Banking
items.body: Develop risk frameworks, cyber hygiene, and crisis playbooks tailored to financial services.

audit.title: Audit & Inspection
audit.description: We deliver critical Audit & Inspection services that ensure compliance, operational efficiency, and effective risk management. Our tailored approach addresses industry-specific requirements and provides insights for strategic decision-making.

items.title: Financial Audits
items.body: Holistic review of financial statements, internal controls, and accounting policies to enhance reliability.

items.title: Operational and Quality Management Audits
items.body: Assessment of processes for efficiency, quality assurance, and continuous improvement.

items.title: Compliance Audits
items.body: External and internal compliance checks against regulatory and policy requirements.

items.title: Supply Chain Audits
items.body: Supplier due diligence, logistics controls, and end-to-end visibility for resilience.

items.title: Performance Audits & Internal Controls Review
items.body: Performance benchmarking and effectiveness testing of internal control environments.

items.title: Technology and IT Audits
items.body: Evaluation of IT governance, security, and system controls including core apps and infrastructure.

safety.title: Safety, Security & Risk Assessment
safety.description: In a world of uncertainty, our Safety, Security & Risk Assessment service stands as a bulwark against threats. From emergency response to enterprise risk programs, we help you build safe, resilient operations.

items.title: Emergency and Crisis Management
items.body: Crisis readiness programs, incident command structures, and multi-agency coordination exercises.

items.title: Threat and Security Risk Management
items.body: Enterprise risk registers, threat modeling, and mitigation roadmaps across assets and people.

items.title: Counter-terrorism Response & Business Continuity Planning
items.body: All-hazards emergency plans integrated with continuity strategies and recovery objectives.

items.title: Crowded Places Protection
items.body: Venue assessments, ingress/egress design, and hostile vehicle mitigation for public spaces.

items.title: CPTED (Crime Prevention Through Environmental Design)
items.body: Designing safer environments through lighting, landscaping, and natural surveillance.

items.title: Comprehensive Emergency Management Plans & Training
items.body: Practical plans, drills, and skill development to embed response capability.

items.title: Insider Threat Risk Assessment
items.body: Holistic frameworks and monitoring to deter, detect, and respond to insider risks.

items.title: Human Reliability Program
items.body: Behavior-focused controls to reduce human-factor risks in safety-critical operations.

items.title: Security Vulnerability Assessment
items.body: Site surveys and red-team evaluations to identify vulnerabilities and prioritize fixes.

items.title: Supply Chain Security Management
items.body: End-to-end cargo, warehouse, and transit security controls and certifications.

items.title: Secure Logistics (program oversight)
items.body: Structured program governance for secure transport and high-value logistics.

it.title: IT & Cybersecurity
it.description: We provide advanced IT and Cybersecurity solutions that safeguard assets, data, and operations—ensuring integrity, confidentiality, and availability of vital information.

items.title: Network Security
items.body: Architecture reviews, segmentation, and secure configuration baselines.

items.title: Data Encryption and Endpoint Security
items.body: Key management, disk encryption, and EDR deployment and tuning.

items.title: Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing
items.body: Continuous testing and prioritized remediation roadmaps.

items.title: Security Awareness Training
items.body: Role-based training and phishing simulations that change behavior.

items.title: Incident Response and Management
items.body: Playbooks, tabletop exercises, and on-call support to contain and recover.

items.title: Compliance & Regulatory Consulting
items.body: Gap assessments and readiness for ISO 27001, NCA ECC, PCI DSS, and more.
